executable.title: Acquire Interson B Mode
executable.description: Acquire multiple B-Mode frames with the Interson USB probe.
executable.acknowledgements: This effort was sponsored by the U.S. Government under Other Transactions Number W81XWH-15-9-0001/W81XWH-19-9-0015 (MTEC 19-08-MuLTI-0079).

integer.name: frequencyIndex
integer.label: Frequency Index
integer.description: Index of the frequency to examine. See the output of PrintIntersonProbeInfo.

integer.name: focusIndex
integer.label: Focus Index
integer.description: Index of the focus to examine. See the output of PrintIntersonProbeInfo.

integer.name: highVoltage
integer.label: High Voltage
integer.description: Percentage of the high voltage for transducer excitation.
